sentences.en: After a number of mishaps she did manage to get back to Germany.
sentences.cn: 发生了几次小的不幸之后，她设法回到了德国。

sentences.en: But Miss Amory was savage at her mishap.
sentences.cn: 但艾默里小姐对这件倒霉事儿却大发雷霆.

sentences.en: He thought she knew of his mishap, too.
sentences.cn: 他想,她也知道了他那件倒霉的事.

sentences.en: I had a slight mishap with one of the glasses.
sentences.cn: 我犯了一个小小的错误，把其中的一个玻璃杯打破了。

sentences.en: I'm afraid your son had a slight mishap in the playground.
sentences.cn: 不好了,你儿子在操场上出了点小意外.

sentences.en: I'm sorry , but we can't take on any responsibility for every kind of mishap.
sentences.cn: 很抱歉,对任何不幸, 我们不能承担任何责任.

sentences.en: Many species will be dwarfed due to this mishap.
sentences.cn: 许多物种都因这一灾祸而发育不良.

sentences.en: Our journey ended without ( further ) mishap.
sentences.cn: 我们的旅程 ( 后来 ) 一路平安.

sentences.en: Tell your mother you have arrived here without mishap.
sentences.cn: 告诉你母亲你已经平平安安到达这里.

sentences.en: The journey went off without mishap.
The plot passed off without mishap.
Trains run on schedule without mishap.
We had a slight mishap with the car, eg a puncture.
sentences.cn: 我们的汽车出了点小事儿(如轮胎扎破).

sentences.en: We have to know where the relic is so we can prepare for any mishap.
sentences.cn: 我们得知道文物在哪里,才能避免灾祸.

sentences.en: With a little care you could have avoided the mishap.
sentences.cn: 你要是小心一点,本来是可以避免这场不测之祸的.

trans.tran_en: A mishap is an unfortunate but not very serious event that happens to someone
